content.rendered:
In The Investigations, the engine of Holmes’s mind is racing full throttle, as he bears down on the puzzle of the Quiet Crescent, the case of the Apprentice’s Notebook and other mind-boggling mysteries.

Enjoy a collection of seven classic stories from the newly discovered dispatch box of John Watson, MD.

excerpt.rendered: In The Investigations, the engine of Holmes’s mind is racing full throttle, as he bears down on the puzzle of the Quiet Crescent, the case of the Apprentice’s Notebook and other mind-boggling mysteries. Enjoy a collection of seven classic stories from the newly discovered dispatch box of John Watson, MD.
